Post-Ad-Text: Stories and adventures for every day, a large library of audio books, constantly replenished with new works. Join us right now!

welcome-selections: Welcome to our carefully curated world of literature! In this section, we invite you to embark on a literary journey through our thoughtfully chosen book selections. Whether you're a passionate bibliophile, a casual reader, or someone seeking the perfect book gift, our collection has something for everyone.
AboutMe-text-profile: I really want to tell something about myself, but the owner of the profile doesn't do it :( That's why this text is here. It's sad though.
About-us-part1: Hello! I'm the only developer Adrian and this is my pet-project FoxWithBook. The goal of my project is to create a platform with audiobooks that I would like to use myself :)
About-us-part2: This is an educational and non-commercial project.
About-us-part3: A detailed list of site functionality can be found in the README.txt file in the project repository
About-us-PS1: Also you can contact me wia
